Equipment.name: Kitchen Scale
Equipment.caption: A good quality scale is one of the most important aspects of making perfect dough. Being able to measure down to the gram is key. Don't overlook this important tool in the kitchen.

Ingredients.name: Antimo Caputo Chef's 00 Flour
Ingredients.caption: This is very high quality flour. Perfect for when you want to make thin crust pizza.

Ingredients.name: King Arthur Flour
Ingredients.caption: Why not spend a few extra dollars at the gorcery store to get flour that will make your crusts really great! This brand is most likely sitting there in your local gorcery store. Make sure it's bread flour. If you can find it locally, just order it online.
